# reloadDefaultFontFamilies()

**Instance Method**

Triggers a reload to the default state, so that the delegate is called.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func reloadDefaultFontFamilies()
```

## Discussion

This reloading provides the delegate opportunity to scrutinize the default list of fonts to be displayed in the panel.

## Enabling Font Changes

- **isEnabled**: A Boolean that shows whether the receiver’s Set button is enabled.

items.description: A Boolean that shows whether the receiver’s Set button is enabled.
